title: Regression of the Close Combat Mage
summary:
As a powerful 8th class mage, Ian Paige took countless innocent lives under the orders of Emperor Ragnar, a close friend and ruler of the Greenriver Empire. Yet despite their closeness, Ragnar views Ian as a threat and subsequently poisons him. 

Using time magic, Ian saves himself and returns 30 years to the past. Now a young boy, Ian joins an elite order of mages to hone his abilities once again.

 This time, he’ll get revenge on the emperor who betrayed him and reclaim glory as an 8th class mage!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/8%ED%81%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%8A%A4-%EB%A7%88%EB%B2%95%EC%82%AC%EC%9D%98-%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80/2514), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57140255)

title: I’m Not That Kind of Talent
summary:
I'm not that kind of person.

I, Dion Hart, am a sickly person who vomits blood whenever I'm stressed.

However, at the same time, I'm Count Hart, who has somehow been misunderstood and thought of as a strong person, and thereby feared by everyone.

---
I am a sickly person who vomits blood whenever I get stressed. Deon Hart. However, at the same time as Honorary Count Hart, who is somehow misunderstood as strong and feared by everyone in the Empire, In the demon realm, he became the commander of the 0th Corps, the most trusted by the demon king... Yes?! me? I'm not that kind of person?!

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5301471)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9099632), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=802840)

**Official Translations:**

* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wobushinazhongrencai/list?title_no=2335)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/not-that-kind-of-talent/list?title_no=5145)
* [Indonesian](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/im-not-that-kind-of-talent/list?title_no=5239)

title: Level 999 Goblin
summary:
The protagonist Kim Chulsoo works his ass off for a living as a manual laborer in real life and by grinding for and selling items in a game.

He finally gets the chance to switch to a hidden class, hoping for that one big shot in life…!

But the hidden class turns out to be... a Goblin Summoner?!

title: The Monster Princess’s Courtship
summary: No summary available.

title: What Can I Do Alone?
summary: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!

title: The more I die, the more invincible I become.
summary:
Summoned into a world where the divine and martial arts coexisted, Qiao Mu can revive infinitely and level up.
The more tragic his death, the stronger he becomes after he is revived. The enemies are shocked to realize after defeating a young man an older man shows up, repeating infinitely!
Rumors started to spread about a legendary Qiao family… Wait, no one told me that reviving makes me older!

Other Official:
[AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/655874), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc36073)

title: I Wanted a Divorce, But My Husband Became Obsessed With Me
I’m the brave puppy that will save the villainess
Healing Touch
summary:
"Sunbae, what have you been up to these last few nights?"  
  
Taeyoung, who is living with his hobae(his buddy), Junghoon, has a problem.  
He relieves himself while thinking of Junghoon every night, but can't finish.  
But what is..?! While they're drinking together, Junghoon offers to lend his hand…!

title: Eternal Love
summary: When Wen Yifan returned to her hometown for work, she met the rumoured “First-Class Handsome Guy” in a bar, but he turned out to be Sang Yan, whom she hurt and rejected in high school! In a twist of fate, the two people who could never get along kept bumping into each other. They even rented the same unit by chance and became housemates! Unspoken feelings refusing to see the light of day, strong emotions stirring beneath it all… Let’s see how Sang Yan, the “Peak Ideal Boyfriend” interprets and expresses deep affections and sweet love!

title: The Demon-Slaying Madman—reborn as a demon
summary: In a final battle that claimed them both, the mightiest of heroes, “Gelong”, perished alongside the Demon Lord. Five years later, he is reborn—only to awaken in the heart of his enemies’ domain, his soul now inhabiting the frail body of a lowly demon. But an unforeseen power stirs within this feeble vessel, ignited by his very soul: the ancient evolutionary might of the Serpent God. Gelong, a man once renowned for a ferocity that surpassed the demons themselves—what seas of blood will he now ignite with a truly demonic body?

title: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
summary: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title: Please Take Care
summary: Help! Why is my blind date my 'ex'-boyfriend?!

title: The Heat of the Reincarnated Villainess
summary:
Konoha Satou has a dark history, written throughout middle school-a fantasy adventure of love and magic about the Count's daughter Konoha Magnolia and the knights who love her! But when it looks like that dark history is going to be uncovered by her mother, Konoha panics and dies in a traffic accident! Opening her eyes, she finds that she's been reincarnated into the world of her own dark history as Iana Magnolia, the worst villainess of her own creation!  
  
Ghost-seeing School Boys oneshot included in volume 1 as chapter 3.5.

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: Magic Lord
summary: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.

title: Enough with the Flirting
summary:
Upon opening my eyes after a bus accident, I found myself in the fantasy world of a web novel I enjoyed reading… the only catch is, I reincarnated twenty years before the novel begins! Reborn as Princess Yerenica of the small Lebovny kingdom, I'm determined to change the future in order to prevent the series of unfortunate events that will soon occur. In the original story, my older sister, Tejavia, is pregnant with the future female lead, when she's suddenly kidnapped by the Belgoat Empire's emperor. But in my desperate attempts to protect her, I got kidnapped instead! And as if that wasn't bad enough, my body is ridiculously weak to magic. But… strangely enough, whenever I'm by the emperor, I feel fine! The only way to save the emperor, who's destined to die at the hands of his own son after marrying the villainess, and save myself from being afflicted by magic… is for us to marry!  
  
"Marry me, Father."  
  
"'Father?' Princess, I haven't married yet, nor do I have any kids…"  


---

title: Prepaid Dragon King Tanks Everything!
summary:
“You ate me, so at least give me some kind of compensation, yeah?!”

Dragon King: “Fine! I’ll give you a prepaid cultivation technique—comprehend it first, then catch up with the training later!”

Me: “You think that’s enough?! I had to smell your nasty dragon breath—mental damage times two, buddy!”

Dragon King: “What do you want from me?!”

Me: “From now on, we’re like immortals sharing a single health bar. All the damage? You take it!”

Dragon King: “Damn it! You lunatic! Why does my ten-thousand-war-chariots-level HP bar feel so short now?! Guess it’s time to get a job…”

title: The Promise Isn’t Mine
summary:
"Kill me, as you promised." 

When her twin sister Leyla, the Holy Maiden, suddenly disappears one day, the ordinary Elena finds herself having to marry Crown Prince Kyle, a man infamous for his ruthlessness, in her stead. After a dreadful marriage ceremony, Kyle demands that a certain promise be fulfilled, to Elena’s confusion.

title: Perfect Secret Love: The Bad New Wife Is A Little Sweet
summary: “How perverted is Si Ye Han’s taste? He still wants me like this?” Waking up, she looked at her reflection in the mirror: explosive wig, tattoos, and demon-like makeup. Any normal person’s eyes would burn if they looked at her for more than a second.

title: I Ended Up Raising the Seed of Evil
summary:
Reborn as a character fated to die at the hands of the final boss, she tries to change destiny by raising the future villain herself. 

But instead of salvation, her plan backfires her once-innocent ward grows into an obsessive man who won’t let her out of his sight.

Did she raise the evil god… or just create a new problem?

title: Frozen Warrior
summary:
Cheok Ryugeom, a Goryeo swordsman, threw himself off a cliff holding the enemy for his master's sake.

However, he wakes up in the modern era—900 years later—after being frostbound...

This is the revenge tale of Goryeo's top swordsman in the modern era.

title: Manager Kim
summary:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.

title: High class
summary: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!

title: A Hero Who Is Good At Everything
summary:
Gang-in Na wakes up in the year 2024 in the middle of South Korea with no memory of where or who he is. Upon hearing a voice that sounds strangely familiar, he comes face to face with a robot named **ACE** (*Autonomous Combat Entity*), who informs him that he was once part of the Earth Federation Forces in the year 2082 and possesses a wide array of skills. Gang-in decides to join forces with **ACE** to recover his lost memories and adapt to life on Earth, but the two look to be in for a bumpy ride.

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=831551)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11564928)

**Official Translations:**  
- [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/hero-of-all-trades/list?title_no=7401)
- [T.Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-versatile-hero/list?title_no=7147)

title: Melody of the Deadwood
summary:
On a continent protected by four witches stands Winfred Academy, a prestigious school of magic. When an incident occurs at the school, Anz finds himself right in the middle of it…  


---

title: My Ex, We Meet Again
summary:
I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. 

A yuri story between two childhood friends.

title: Haeran, the Chemical Engineer
summary:
Hae-ran wants three things.  Good health for her grandfather, one meal per day, and a masterpiece of a lifetime. In front of her appears a potter named Hwaseon (畵仙) who can grant all three wishes. “Be my chemist.”

This will be the beginning of a sad fate... The story of Hwaseon Ye-an, who wants to end his immortal life, and Hae-ran, the only person who can kill him.

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001444)

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: We Got Ourselves Stuck Inside an Adult Fantasy Novel
Underground of Babel (Official)
summary: Though she's a tomboy with a hangup over her tiny chest, Iori has a crush on Sota Seto, who is the pastry chef at the café where she works. Iori was sure that he wasn't interested in her until one day, he suddenly professes his love for her and goes on to kiss her. She sees him unclothed for the first time - and my, he's huge!! She never would have expected the graceful man's lips to be caressing her all over. It's terribly embarrassing, but she discovers that his you-know-what isn't gross at all…

title: Happy Sea World
summary:
Lowell, the "ugly duckling" of the Viscounts of Linthea, is sold in marriage to the Dukes of Hikaruel, a vampire.

Rumors that her political partner, the Duke of Hikaruel, has burn scars all over his body and is crippled, etc., lead her to Hikaruel territory, where she is unable to hide her fears.
But what awaits Roel in the Duchy of Hikaruel is Prince Aslan, a beautiful dark-haired boy, and the kind people of the Duchy of Hikaruel...!

Having grown up in an abusive family, Lowell is bewildered by the Prince's different appearance and the warm atmosphere of the ducal family, but he also feels happy.

"Please, let me stay here forever...!"

Unhappy Lowell's life as the happiest bride in the world begins!

title: Let Me Enjoy the Extra Life
Flowers are flowers, leaves are leaves
For My Lost Love
summary: Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets." When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?

title: Lord Baby Runs A Romance Fantasy With Cash
summary:
I lived without a home or family and suffered until I died, but then an 'angel' appeared and made me an offer.

"You, a professional reader of rofan novels, would you like to be reincarnated into a world created based on rofan?"

Because he said that my (handsome) Dad and my (handsome) older brothers will fed me with a diamond spoon, I was reborn...

—They say I might be a child born from my mother's affair?

As soon as I was born, I was handed over to my relatives and became a servant, facing abuse.

"At this rate, I might freeze to death or starve to death alone."

There's nothing I can do about this situation.

"Daddy, take me away—!"

Let's find a way to survive somehow.
But...

[You have fulfilled the conditions.]
[The trait <Rush and Cash> has awakened.]

[Dear reader, do not hesitate to use any means and methods to obtain what you desire. Conquer and seize it!
Romance novel readers don't back down in situations like this!
Show your abilities!
-Condition: Persuade the Duke of Pheraton and obtain the <Summoning Medium>.
-Reward: 5,000 cash draw ticket.
-Quest rejection penalty: Game over in life.
-Quest failure penalty: Game over in life.]

"So, the quest is to kiss my Dad on the cheek?"

...I've been scammed.

title: The Flower Who Bears The Sword
summary:
A young boy named Mikazuki Kenya was abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitude. At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming. A meeting with Kaguya and Reina, the heroines from the immensely popular game Knight of Giant. The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them.

However, in the story, one of them is destined to die. To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world. Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of Knight of Giant?!

title: Black Killer Whale Baby
summary:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and this is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but the latter doesn’t recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.

---
At age 3, Calypso Aquasiadel is the most outstanding genius her family's ever seen, and no wonder... She's actually a modern girl who's been reborn into the same novel thrice! This time around, Calypso's determined to harness the powers of the mysterious dragon duke and send herself back home. The only problem is, she'll first need to earn the respect of her hardened family to survive until then! Can Calypso win their approval and even their hearts? Or is this life doomed for another do-over?

title: Grand Duke, I Can’t Do It Because It’s Too Cold in The North
High Society
summary:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"
